allow: Bash(powershell -Command "Add-Type -AssemblyName System.Windows.Forms; Start-Sleep -Seconds 2; $screen = [System.Windows.Forms.Screen]::PrimaryScreen.Bounds; $bitmap = New-Object System.Drawing.Bitmap\($screen.Width, $screen.Height\); $graphics = [System.Drawing.Graphics]::FromImage\($bitmap\); $graphics.CopyFromScreen\($screen.Location, [System.Drawing.Point]::Empty, $screen.Size\); $bitmap.Save\(''$env:TEMP\\screenshot.png''\); $bitmap.Dispose\(\); $graphics.Dispose\(\); Write-Host ''Screenshot saved''")
